string_table.str: I will be waiting for you when you are done.
Secure the breach. Clean up your mess.
I told you NOT to go inside.
Relax, brother. You worry too much
Voridus, listen, you fail him one more time trying to prove yourself and I will not be able to save you.
Scout the shell, salvage the ships. That is it. Atriox was clear!
Do not disobey your orders again.
